text:
I wonder if this music is actually in Hindi or any other language. Anyone from India or Pakistan care to weigh in?

Anyway, I always liked this song. A neat and funky use of lyrics at a time when lyrical music (on cartridges) was super-rare.

author: Dat Gaming SUS

text: Mario Kart's continued greatness and huge success is probably directly responsible for this game never getting a sequel, as it'd create competition between 2 Nintendo franchises (with Mario Kart crushing DKR in sales). DKR was quite different at the time, but it seems like Nintendo has slowly taken some inspiration for MK by adding quick flying and underwater sequences. I wouldn't be surprised if a future Mario Kart took the next step and added full flying/water sequences + small open world features like DKR. Oh, and a playable DK cast. And music by David Wise.
